info.name: Anonymous Ylilauta
info.description: Anonymous based theme for Ylilauta. Also removes the annoying AdBlock notice and some ads. You can also use this style as internal style on Ylilauta. Tested only with Ylilauta's default theme! I have feeling that this doesn't work on Internet Explorer...
info.additionalInfo:
Current version: 1.5 -------------------------------------------------- Changelog & Bug Fixes
    08/16/2018
  • Fixed mobile version.
  • Fixed different board layouts for not showing properly.
  • Tweaked thread styles.
  • Tweaked tags page layout.
  • Tweaked toasts.
  • Tweaked notifications.
    08/07/2018
  • Initial update to support the new Ylilauta layout.
  • Removed search page styles.
    07/05/2016
  • Some minor bug fixes.
    07/01/2016
  • Fixed some thread icons.
    07/01/2016
  • Fixed thread actionmenu on mobile devices.
    06/23/2016
  • Fixed post forms colorbuttons
    06/22/2016
  • Added styles for banlist.
  • Fixed some buttons.
  • Fixed bottom bar on truncated posts.
  • Few more minor bug fixes.
    06/17/2016
  • Fixed board padding.
    06/14/2016
  • Addes styles for search page. These styles can cause odd behaviors on other sites and doesn't work if this syle is used as internal style on Ylilauta.
  • Fixed some titles/headers.
  • Fixed links on spoiler.
  • Fixed notifications box.
  • Fixed few minor bugs.
    06/08/2016
  • Fixed some links and other minor bug fixes.
    06/07/2016
  • You can now add this style as internal style on Ylilauta.
  • Added some kind of support for mobile devices.
  • Fixed left bar links and few more minor bugs.
  • Removed logo icons.
  • Ads and "Naamapalmu" bar removed.
  • Changed board title styles a littlebit.
    06/24/2015
  • Fixed frontpage.
    06/09/2015
  • Fixed background colors and borders for threadlists content.
    05/12/2015
  • Changed background image because old one just stopped working.
    02/26/2015
  • Fixed hue for image which contains contact address.
    02/25/2015
  • Inverted color and adjusted hue for image which contains contact address to make it match better with the style.
  • Fixed front page's titles background color.
  • Fixed quick reply's background and border color.
